mapper.select: insert into attendance(userid,attdate,attstarttime) values('m5', to_char (sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), sysdate )
select to_char (attstarttime, 'HH24:MI:SS') from attendance where userid = 'm5' and to_char (attdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = to_char (sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
